019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import freemarker.template.Configuration;
023import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1APIService;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
028import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
029import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.Dynamics;
030import java.io.IOException;
031import java.io.StringWriter;
032import java.util.HashMap;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.logging.Logger;
036import org.yaml.snakeyaml.LoaderOptions;
037import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
038import org.yaml.snakeyaml.constructor.SafeConstructor;
039
040/**
041 * Delegee for reconciling the service
042 */
043@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
044/* default */ class ServiceReconciler {
045
046    private static final String METADATA
047        = V1APIService.SERIALIZED_NAME_METADATA;
048    private static final String LABELS = V1ObjectMeta.SERIALIZED_NAME_LABELS;
049    private static final String ANNOTATIONS
050        = V1ObjectMeta.SERIALIZED_NAME_ANNOTATIONS;
051    protected final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(getClass().getName());
052    private final Configuration fmConfig;
053
054    /**
055     * Instantiates a new service reconciler.
056     *
057     * @param fmConfig the fm config
058     */
059    public ServiceReconciler(Configuration fmConfig) {
060        this.fmConfig = fmConfig;
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * Reconcile.
065     *
066     * @param event the event
067     * @param model the model
068     * @param channel the channel
069     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
070     * @throws TemplateException the template exception
071     * @throws ApiException the api exception
072     */
073    public void reconcile(VmDefChanged event,
074            Map<String, Object> model, VmChannel channel)
075            throws IOException, TemplateException, ApiException {
076        // Get API
077        DynamicKubernetesApi svcApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
078            "services", channel.client());
079
080        // Combine template and data and parse result
081        var fmTemplate = fmConfig.getTemplate("runnerService.ftl.yaml");
082        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
083        fmTemplate.process(model, out);
084        // Avoid Yaml.load due to
085        // https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/2741
086        var svcDef = Dynamics.newFromYaml(
087            new Yaml(new SafeConstructor(new LoaderOptions())), out.toString());
088        mergeMetadata(svcDef, model, channel);
089
090        // Apply
091        K8s.apply(svcApi, svcDef, svcDef.getRaw().toString());
092    }
093
094    private void mergeMetadata(DynamicKubernetesObject svcDef,
095            Map<String, Object> model, VmChannel channel) {
096        // Get metadata from config
097        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
098        var asmData = Optional.of(model)
099            .map(m -> (Map<String, Object>) m.get("config"))
100            .map(c -> (String) c.get("additionalServiceMetadata"))
101            .map(y -> (Map<String, Object>) new Yaml(
102                new SafeConstructor(new LoaderOptions())).load(y))
103            .orElseGet(() -> new HashMap<String, Object>());
104        var json = channel.client().getJSON();
105        JsonObject cfgMeta
106            = json.deserialize(json.serialize(asmData), JsonObject.class);
107
108        // Get metadata from VM definition
109        var vmMeta = GsonPtr.to(channel.vmDefinition()).to("spec")
110            .get(JsonObject.class, "additionalServiceMetadata")
111            .map(JsonObject::deepCopy).orElseGet(() -> new JsonObject());
112
113        // Merge Data from VM definition into config data
114        mergeReplace(GsonPtr.to(cfgMeta).to(LABELS).get(JsonObject.class),
115            GsonPtr.to(vmMeta).to(LABELS).get(JsonObject.class));
116        mergeReplace(
117            GsonPtr.to(cfgMeta).to(ANNOTATIONS).get(JsonObject.class),
118            GsonPtr.to(vmMeta).to(ANNOTATIONS).get(JsonObject.class));
119
120        // Merge additional data into service definition
121        var svcMeta = GsonPtr.to(svcDef.getRaw()).to(METADATA);
122        mergeIfAbsent(svcMeta.to(LABELS).get(JsonObject.class),
123            GsonPtr.to(cfgMeta).to(LABELS).get(JsonObject.class));
124        mergeIfAbsent(svcMeta.to(ANNOTATIONS).get(JsonObject.class),
125            GsonPtr.to(cfgMeta).to(ANNOTATIONS).get(JsonObject.class));
126    }
127
128    private void mergeReplace(JsonObject dest, JsonObject src) {
129        for (var e : src.entrySet()) {
130            if (e.getValue().isJsonNull()) {
131                dest.remove(e.getKey());
132                continue;
133            }
134            dest.add(e.getKey(), e.getValue());
135        }
136    }
137
138    private void mergeIfAbsent(JsonObject dest, JsonObject src) {
139        for (var e : src.entrySet()) {
140            if (dest.has(e.getKey())) {
141                continue;
142            }
143            dest.add(e.getKey(), e.getValue());
144        }
145    }
146
147}
